message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $12,000.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this product is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
